roleset.name: involve in contention

example.name: normal usage
example.text: A majority of an NIH - appointed panel recommended late last year that the research continue under carefully controlled conditions , but the issue became embroiled in politics as anti - abortion groups continued to oppose federal funding .

propbank.arg: as anti - abortion groups continued to oppose federal funding

example.name: agent, sorta
example.text: The subsequent drive to reform Hong Kong 's markets also has embroiled the interest - rate futures contract .

propbank.arg: The subsequent drive to reform Hong Kong 's markets

roleset.note: EMBROIL-V NOTES: I feel there's some sort of unstated "in controversy" in the secondexample. (from embroil.01-v)
